enrollPage.title: Enrollment Form Instructions
enrollPage.description: Please carefully read the following conditions and tips before submitting your enrollment form.

instructions.inst1: All form fields must be filled accurately and completely.
instructions.inst2: Provide official company name as registered legally.
instructions.inst3: Provide complete physical business address (no P.O. boxes).
instructions.inst4: Commercial register and tax ID must be valid and up-to-date.
instructions.inst5: Ensure your email and phone number are correct to receive status updates.
instructions.inst6: Clearly explain your business needs and expectations.
instructions.inst7: Be prepared to provide additional documents if requested.
instructions.inst8: Typically takes 3-5 business days for review and approval.
instructions.inst9: support@example.com for any questions about the enrollment process.
